ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Shamaine Daniels wins Democratic nomination for U.S. House in Pennsylvania's 10th Congressional District. #APRaceCall at 4:04 p.m. EDT.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Lisa Scheller wins Republican nomination for U.S. House in Pennsylvania's 7th Congressional District. #APRaceCall at 3:55 p.m. EDT.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Guy Ciarrocchi wins Republican nomination for U.S. House in Pennsylvania's 6th Congressional District. #APRaceCall at 3:40 p.m. EDT.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The Food and Drug Administration commissioner says a closed factory tied to the U.S. baby formula shortage could be up and running as soon as next week. Formula maker Abbott says once production resumes, new formula could reach stores in about two months.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The national reckoning over racial inequality sparked by George Floyd's murder two years ago has gone on behind closed doors inside America's intelligence agencies.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: U.S. intelligence agencies have long fallen short of their public commitments to hire and promote more people of color. Government stats show a consistent trend: At rising levels of rank, minority representation goes down.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: President Biden's trip to South Korea and Japan aims to build rapport with those nations’ leaders. Biden will try to send a message to China that Russia’s faltering invasion of Ukraine should give Beijing pause about its own saber-rattling in the Pacific.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: President Biden's trip to South Korea and Japan is aimed at building rapport with the two nations’ leaders. He also wants to send a message to China: Russia’s faltering invasion of Ukraine should make Beijing think twice about its saber-rattling.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: The U.S. believes North Korea could conduct another missile test — or nuclear test — that would coincide with President Biden’s Asian trip. Biden is set to arrive in South Korea on Friday, then head to Japan on Sunday.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Christine Drazan wins Republican nomination for governor in Oregon primary election. #APRaceCall at 6:01 p.m. PDT.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Counting of mailed ballots in Pennsylvania is drawing fresh scrutiny amid a too-close-to-call U.S. Senate primary between Republicans David McCormick and Dr. Mehmet Oz. Here's how the state's mailed-ballot system works.

ap.name: AP
ap.text:
Our @AP_Politics reporters want to answer your questions. Reply to this tweet, and we'll do our best to answer it in the @TwitterSpaces.

For full Midterms 2022 coverage:

ap.name: AP
ap.text:
How did Donald Trump-endorsed candidates fare in key races on Tuesday night? Join @AP at 1 p.m. ET for a debrief of the primaries in North Carolina, Pennsylvania and more.

🎙️@MegKinnardAP
🎙️@timelywriter

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: David Roth wins Democratic nomination for U.S. Senate in Idaho primary election. #APRaceCall at 8:26 a.m. MDT.

ap.name: AP
ap.text:
Donald Trump’s support buoyed a Senate candidate to victory in North Carolina. His pick in Pennsylvania remains in a tough fight. And the bad behavior of a GOP congressman in a key race caught up with him.
Here are the takeaways from Tuesday's primary.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: Vice President Harris will tell the U.S. Coast Guard Academy’s graduating cadets they’re starting their service at a crucial moment for the world. In prepared remarks, Harris calls it a period in history when “fundamental principles are under threat.”

ap.name: AP
ap.text: As Turkish President Erdogan takes a tough line against the NATO membership bids of Finland and Sweden despite less strident statements from some of his aides, the U.S. tries to determine how serious he is and what it might take to get him to back down.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Dan Pastore wins Democratic nomination for U.S. House in Pennsylvania's 16th Congressional District. #APRaceCall at 1:45 a.m. EDT.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Mike Simpson wins Republican nomination for U.S. House in Idaho's 2nd Congressional District. #APRaceCall at 10:56 p.m. MDT.

ap.name: AP
ap.text: BREAKING: Christian Nascimento wins Republican nomination for U.S. House in Pennsylvania's 4th Congressional District. #APRaceCall at 12:46 a.m. EDT.

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
🍼 Social media posts advise Americans facing a baby formula shortage to buy it from Amazon Canada.

But many formula products are unavailable for shipping to the states or on offer from third-party vendors charging above market prices

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
🍌 Scientists have debunked a myth circulating on Facebook for years that eating overripe bananas can prevent cancer

Experts told us the fruit does not contain an immune-boosting protein, which is only found in mammals

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
TikToks with millions of views falsely claim the father of Philippine president-elect Ferdinand Marcos Jr built a prestigious college when he was dictator

La Consolacion in Manila was founded in 1902, more than a decade before Marcos Sr was born

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: 🇦🇺 No evidence Australian political parties 'plan mandatory Covid-19 vaccination'

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
Sri Lanka’s information minister after he was attacked during unrest? ❌

The video actually shows a former municipal councillor in Sri Lanka, not a government minister

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: 🇱🇰 Hoax AFP article about ex-Sri Lankan PM misleads online

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: 🇵🇭 Posts share false Covid lockdown notice for Manila after Philippine elections

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
Rumours that a proposed law in Australia will ban people from growing their own food have sparked outrage

The bill updates legislation in the state of Victoria on things like animal disease control and pesticides, but it doesn't stop people growing food

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
🌎 A Facebook post shows satellite images of nearly identical expanses of Arctic sea ice to cast doubt on the science of global warming

But the images don't tell the whole story. Experts say average Arctic sea ice extent has decreased over decades

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
⚖️ Posts claim an Alabama law imposes criminal penalties on those who receive abortions.

That's false -- the legislation in question was blocked by a federal judge in 2019 before it took effect, and the state does not penalize someone who gets an abortion

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: Pediatricians advise against making baby formula at home

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: ❌ This photo was shot in the Philippines and does not show a rally for ousted Pakistan PM Imran Khan

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
🇰🇷 A claim that ethnically Korean Chinese nationals living in South Korea receive benefits not granted to citizens is circulating online

Government spokespersons say the benefits are not granted to non-citizens -- unless they are in a multicultural family

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: ⚖️ Posts on social media claim Missouri banned emergency contraception. That is false -- legal experts say the state's abortion law makes no direct mention of contraceptives, including Plan B

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: Local officials have said they believe the shooting suspect in Buffalo, New York acted alone. A tweet claimed to have been sent by his accomplice is from an imposter account that was suspended

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: Three myths about electric cars

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
🇱🇰 Video of boats surrounding the naval port that former prime minister Mahinda Rajapaksa fled to in May 2022? ❌

The clip actually shows fishermen gathered for a religious ritual two months before Rajapaksa quit.

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
🇨🇳 Video shows Shanghai residents celebrating the lifting of lockdown?

False ❌ The clip was filmed in China's eastern Zhejiang province

afp.name: AFP
afp.text: 🇮🇳⚠️ This widely circulated photo does not show students caught making bombs in a university hostel in India, it was actually taken after a prostitution ring bust in 2019

afp.name: AFP
afp.text:
Motorists in Malaysia stuck in a huge traffic jam ahead of Eid celebrations to mark the end of Ramadan?

Footage of a line of cars stretched along a highway was actually filmed in Indonesia in March, before the Islamic holy month of Ramadan

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"Have they ended up on people's plates by now?"

The SNP's Westminster leader, Ian Blackford, spoke to #BBCNewscast about cost of living, party gate - and also, his lambs 🐑

Hear more on BBC Sounds

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Will Sue Gray's report into Downing Street parties be damning for Boris Johnson?

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: "Middle-class coke heads should stop kidding themselves," says PM Boris Johnson, as government introduces five-year bans for drug-related offences in football

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Welsh government spends £4.25m on farm for Green Man festival

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Ex-Hartlepool Labour MP Mike Hill to pay £434,000 to worker he sexually assaulted

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"It was wrong, [the PM] has apologised a lot for it and so he should"

Tory MP Iain Duncan Smith says "they lost control of what was happening in Downing St" but moving forward there are decisions to be made on cost of living - "that's the big issue"

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"I just felt his position was unrecoverable... I was wrong."

Conservative MP Charles Walker tells #Newsnight Boris Johnson is an "extraordinary politician" as he's recovered after the Partygate scandal like a written off cricketer scoring a century

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"Today there is no question: Nato is relevant, it is effective, and is more needed now than ever"

US President Joe Biden speaks at the Nato expansion meeting as Finland and Sweden formally apply for membership

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
UK's top civil servant, Cabinet Secretary Simon Case, has been told he won't be fined, sources tell BBC

Mr Case was forced to step aside from his role leading an inquiry into lockdown parties, after it emerged an event was held in his own office

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"We now need the Sue Gray report to be published"

Lib Dem leader Sir Ed Davey says "the prime minister got a fine... he broke the law and he lied to parliament, he should go"

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Met Police Partygate investigation involved 12 detectives and cost £460,000

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Labour wants a windfall tax on energy giants to help with rising costs. Boris Johnson says "We're already helping people with the cost of living in any way that we can." 4 mins on the arguments over a windfall tax. Produced Mary Fuller, Catherine Karelli

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Channel 4 News didn't do itself any favours in terms of impartiality, says Culture Secretary Nadine Dorries

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
Labour leader Keir Starmer says police investigation has shown "industrial scale lawbreaking in Downing Street... that reflects a culture and the prime minister sets the culture"

“Of course he should resign,” he says

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
Could your family live on £1,200 a month? 

This is the question that was posed to Home Secretary Priti Patel at the annual Police Federation conference...

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text: Pressure builds on Rishi Sunak to act now on living costs

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
"It's very difficult" to see how Keir Starmer could receive a fine if the PM doesn't receive another, says Labour's Lord Blunkett

"I think the prime minister should be allowed to get on with the job," says Conservative Baroness Morgan

#PoliticsLive

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
On today's #PoliticsLive

Baroness Morgan, Conservative
Lord Blunkett, Labour
Timendra Harkness, Author and broadcaster
Rachel Cunliffe, New Statesman

On @BBCTwo now

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
The end of the police inquiry paves the way for the publication of the full Sue Gray report into lockdown gatherings

The BBC understands the report is expected to be published next week

bbc.name: BBC
bbc.text:
PM Boris Johnson will face no further fines over Partygate, the BBC understands

Mr Johnson's wife Carrie will also face no further action

cbc.text: CSIS was concerned about extremist violence, recruitment amid Freedom Convoy: top spy | CBC News

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: MP accuses RCMP officials of delivering 'dodgy' testimony on facial recognition technology | CBC News

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: Rosemary Barton Live speaks with U.S. trade representative Katherine Tai, in her first visit to Canada, about the state of the two nations' trade relationship. Tai says dairy and supply management remain a point of contention between Canada-U.S. economies.

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: Rosemary Barton Live speaks with Ukraine's ambassador to the United Nations, Sergiy Kyslytsya, about concerns of Russia potentially increasing its aggression against Ukraine. He says Russians are 'desperate' in trying to escalate the military situation as much as they can.

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: 'Time to go': Parliamentary Black caucus starts a new chapter as Greg Fergus leaves | CBC News  by @CBCDavid

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: RCMP looks to bolster its ranks with civilians, says it's 'playing with the DNA' of the service | CBC News  by @cattunneycbc

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: Trash talk: unparliamentary language has a long history in the House of Commons | CBC News  by @peterzimonjic

cbc.text: CBC Radio's The House: New world disorder | CBC Radio

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: Retired Canadian Forces reservist delivers life-saving medical supplies to Ukrainian soldiers | CBC News  by @AshleyBurkeCBC

cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.text: Federal COVID-19 supports expire today as Ottawa says 'extraordinary' measures no longer needed | CBC News  by @nickjboisvert

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text: After 10 years at the helm of our Norwegian Member @NRKno, read @TGEriksenNRK's reflections on why “#trust isn’t built during a crisis”, how #PublicServiceMedia must learn to “love unpredictability” and more:

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Earlier this week, our Head of Radio, Edita Kudláčová, opened #RDE22 by championing the continued relevance of #radio 

Catch up on this and other sessions - including @CillaBenko @sverigesradio on why linear radio remains a concept to build on

More 👉

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
EBU Executive Board Member and LRT DG Monika Garbačiauskaitė-Budrienė:

"LRT serves the whole of society...it has a special mission and every effort must be made to ensure credibility and impartiality."

Read more on the need for journalists to reconnect with all audiences👇

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
An engineer working for our Ukrainian Member has been kidnapped by Russian forces

We call for his immediate release

Attacks and intimidation of #media workers must not be allowed to continue

#Ukraine️

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Through her influence on the shaping of Europe's technological landscape, @DelphineErnotte, EBU President and France Télévisions CEO, has been named as one of the key players in Europe's technological revolution by @POLITICOEurope 

#POLITICOTech28 @LivePOLITICO @Francetele

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
With the summer sports season almost upon us, stay ahead of the game by implementing valuable AI tools in your sports coverage.

⚽ How to Implement Artificial Intelligence in Your Sports Coverage

📆 2 to 3 June 2022

📍 EBU, Geneva (face to face)

👉

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text: Participants from across our #PublicServiceMedia membership are meeting in person in #Geneva this week at our #News Contacts Meeting. They’re hearing about what’s it like reporting from #Ukraine, working in groups to practice social media verification, #networking, and much more.

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
‘A European Perspective’, the EBU-led digital #news project, has been given the green light for Phase II - due to popular demand for trustworthy news. 

#PublicServiceMedia are developing the technology behind this essential service. 

Learn more:

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
We are pleased to welcome @MelissaFleming and the impressive team of @UN Communications Directors from around the world. 

We are more than ever committed to working together to fight fake news and help stop the spread of misinformation.

#KeepMediaGood #PublicServiceMedia

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Don’t miss our International Broadcasting Assembly in the EBU’s #Brussels office on 19 and 20 May! 

We are very excited to welcome you in person for a meeting with plenty of #networking opportunities. 

Register here:  (EBU Members only)

#broadcasting

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
What an incredible night! A message of thanks from our Director General Noel Curran.

#ESC2022 #Eurovision

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
What an incredible night! A message of thanks from our Director General Noel Curran.

#ESC2022 #Eurovision

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Congratulations to our Ukrainian Member UA:PBC @suspilne_news  whose artist Kalush Orchestra has won the #Eurovision Song Contest 2022! They gave an incredible performance of "Stefania”. 🎉

It's the 3rd win for Ukraine who last triumphed in 2016.

More:

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
We couldn't do it without you. THANK YOU, GRAZIE MILLE from the EBU family! 

#ESC2022 #Eurovision #Turin

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
We have the best fans. That's it, that's the tweet 🤩

#eurovision #ESC2022

ebu.name: European Broadcasting Union (EBU)
ebu.text:
Are you watching tonight?! 🥳🎤 Here’s how! 

#ESC2022 #eurovision @Eurovision

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text: Get a sneak peek of what mixed reality experiences will be like on Project Cambria, our next VR headset. Mixed reality will blend the physical world with the virtual — think fishing 🎣 under your living room floor or playing chess♟️with your friend’s avatar at your coffee table.

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.text: NFTs allow creators to take control over their work, fanbase and income. Starting this week, you may start to see digital collectibles on @instagram. Oh and they ✨shimmer✨

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text:
Ahead of #AusVotes2022 tomorrow, read on for a round-up of First Draft's research on Australia's past and current elections. 

First up, an election misinformation playbook written in the context of Australia by @annekrugernews and @estherswchan

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: #Auspoll2022 Election blackout has begun and will last until the close of the poll on election day. The rule only applies to broadcasters so political ads can still be published by online or print media. Here's a list of online ad libs worth monitoring 🗒️

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: It's #electionweek in Australia! Journalists and newsrooms covering #auspoll2022 we've got you covered: bookmark the thread below with online resources you'll need to monitor trends/narratives. Best of all, these tools are all free! #ausvotes22 #auspol

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: First Draft has been closely monitoring Facebook’s online Ad Library this election and found minor parties have also rolled out the red carpet for foreign interference fearmongering. Read our newest report by @juliabergin1 #auspol #ausvotes2022

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: Pushing a red line on voters ... a piece for @firstdraftnews on how Australian politicians and political parties are ratcheting up rhetoric of Chinese interference for #auspoll2022 election gains

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text:
As Australians prepare to head to the polls, political parties and politicians have stoked fear-fuelled narratives about China in a bid to secure votes, our monitoring has shown. We've just published a new report by @juliabergin1 

#auspol #ausvotes

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: Ahead of the 2022 Australian federal election #auspol #ausvotes, we’ve found that false claims about election fraud have spread from the 2020 US election. Thread 👇

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text:
📢 مجموعة رائعة من أدوات البحث والتحقق

🎯 جمعت @firstdraftnews مجموعة جديدة من الأدوات المتخصصة في جمع المعلومات والتحقق منها على موقع التواصل تيك توك إضافة إلى جمع البيانات عن كوفيد19 وأدوات تشمل التحقق من الصور والفيديو وأرشفة الوثائق وصفحات الويب.👇

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: #ICYMI @firstdraftnews @estherswchan writes on tactics and strategies commonly used to spread election disinformation and how journalists can tackle the problem

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: In this research study for @firstdraftnews, @jailongo, Daniel Acosta, Shaydanay Urbani, and Rory Smith examine how vaccine misinformation has impacted the Latino community.

firstdraft.name: First Draft
firstdraft.text: We've learnt some valuable lessons from covering election disinformation in the past few years. Read on for common types of election disinfo, tactics and techniques, and the strategies used on open versus closed platforms @BBCNews @estherswchan

google.name: Google
google.text: Engineering lead Gordon Kuo talks about landing his job at Google, despite initial rejection: “Finding the right fit doesn’t always happen right away, and I appreciated that my recruiter was so committed to setting me up for success.”→  #MyPathToGoogle

google.name: Google
google.text: For Global Accessibility Awareness Day, Eve Andersson, our Senior Director of Product Inclusion, Equity, and Accessibility, shares more about the ways we’re working alongside the disability community to build a more inclusive and accessible world →  #GAAD

google.name: Google
google.text: Bay View, the latest addition to our Silicon Valley headquarters, is a net water-positive campus with a major focus on ecological restoration. It's a key step towards our goal of replenishing 120% of the water we consume by 2030. Learn more →

google.name: Google
google.text: On Global Accessibility Awareness Day (#GAAD), disability advocate @andraealavant pays tribute to her close friend and colleague Stacey Park Milbern, who would’ve turned 35 today. Learn about Stacey’s legacy in championing a more inclusive world →

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: PM Modi will travel to #Tokyo for his second in-person Quad summit, where he will also hold bilateral talks with U.S. President Joseph Biden, Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida and Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison, the MEA said. @suhasinih

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: #India is closely monitoring the construction of a bridge by #China on the Pangong Tso (lake) in eastern #Ladakh, which is in “occupied territory”, the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) said. | @dperi84 @suhasinih

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: In this episode of The Hindu's In Focus podcast, Dr. Sanjoy Barbora speaks to us on the confusion over the implementation of the #NRC in #Assam and the fate of those affected by it. Hosted by @abaruah64

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: #China ’s Communist Party has failed in its efforts to change the minds of #Tibetan people, the #DalaiLama said. | @ananthkrishnan writes

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: #PMModi will travel to Tokyo for his second in-person Quad summit, where he will also hold bilateral talks with U.S. President #JosephBiden, Japanese PM Fumio Kishida and Australian PM Scott Morrison, the #MEA announced. | @suhasinih writes

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: Sri Lankan PM #RanilWickremesinghe has designated Maldivian Parliamentary Speaker and former President Mohamed Nasheed as the “coordinator” for securing foreign aid to #SriLanka that is facing an unprecedented #economic crisis. | @Meerasrini writes

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: External Affairs Minister #SJaishankar shed light on the commodities shock that the #Ukraine crisis has unleashed and argued in favour of the interest of the developing world. | @janusmyth writes

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: The #PDP , headed by #MehboobaMufti (PDP), said the #Kashmir issue was a political problem and convictions can’t solve it. The party was reacting to the conviction of JKLF chief Yasin Malik by a court in a terror funding case.

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: #India is closely monitoring the construction of a bridge by China on the #PangongTso (lake) in eastern Ladakh, which is in “occupied territory”, the #MEA said. | @dperi84 and @suhasinih write

hindu.name: The Hindu
hindu.text: The #SupremeCourt dismissed a review petition filed by the Shapoorji Pallonji group against the court’s judgment upholding the ouster of Cyrus Mistry as Executive Chairman of Tata Sons Private Limited.

hindu.name: The Hindu

Last week, a vandal fired a well-aimed bullet into the crotch of the silhouette of Johnny Cash that was painted on a 50,000-gallon water tower.

The bullet hole spilled about 180,000 gallons over roughly six days.
